Detailed Description

nano GPIO functions.

Nano: General purpose functions. LED control, IRQ allocation.

portCHAR gpio0_irq_allocate ( uint8_t  pin,
void(*)(void)  isr,
uint8_t  edge 
)

Allocate interrupt in port 0.

Parameters:
pin port pin to allocate
isr interrupt service routine
edge 0 = rising edge, anything else falling edge
Returns:
pdTRUE allocation succeeded

pdFALSE interrupt reserved or not available on platform
